title: RP ERROR
body:
i bought 20 Eu gift card and i cant redeem it and every time i enter the code gives me this...ERROR We apologize, but our store has encountered an error. Please contact us at http://support.leagueoflegends.com/ for additional support.
please help me ....

replies.body:
You're probably better off posting on the EU boards since if there's any issues they'll be the ones to know, but usually with cases like these you'd want to submit a ticket to player support. If it's just an error with the card they'll probs as for the gift card number (might need proof of purchase as well) and they should be able to help you from there.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
